--- insert_values_default.sql
insert foo (foo, bar)
values (1, default)
--- AST
&ast.Insert{
  Insert:       0,
  InsertOrType: "",
  TableName:    &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 7,
    NameEnd: 10,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 12,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 17,
      NameEnd: 20,
      Name:    "bar",
    },
  },
  Input: &ast.ValuesInput{
    Values: 22,
    Rows:   []*ast.ValuesRow{
      &ast.ValuesRow{
        Lparen: 29,
        Rparen: 40,
        Exprs:  []*ast.DefaultExpr{
          &ast.DefaultExpr{
            DefaultPos: -1,
            Default:    false,
            Expr:       &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 30,
              ValueEnd: 31,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
          },
          &ast.DefaultExpr{
            DefaultPos: 33,
            Default:    true,
            Expr:       nil,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
INSERT INTO foo (foo, bar) VALUES (1, DEFAULT)
